entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
